original_text: And when he looked on Amalek, he took up his parable, and said, Amalek was the first of the nations; but his latter end shall be that he perish for ever.
korean_text: 또 아말렉을 바라보며 예언하여 이르기를 아말렉은 민족들의 으뜸이나 그의 종말은 멸망에 이르리로다 하고

sentences.original_text: And when he looked on Amalek
Amalek was the first of the nations
but his latter end shall be that he perish for ever
